title: Doom Boy by The Dirty Nil
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I know you try to stay happy
But the winds of doubt are blowing heavy
Tell me, girl, do you like
The Cro-Mags and Turnstile?

[Pre-Chorus]
If you do, I'm begging you
Come with me, let me be

[Chorus]
Your doom boy
We could hold hands
Listen to Slayer
In the back of my Dodge Caravan

[Verse 2]
Do you delight in rule breaking?
Dancing to thrash and hailing Satan
Okay, alright
Let's rage tonight

[Pre-Chorus]
Crank the dial and stay a while
Then you'll see, I could be

[Chorus]
Your doom boy
We could hold hands
Listen to Slayer
In the back of my Dodge Caravan

[Post-Chorus]
It's my mom's Dodge Caravan

[Guitar Solo]

[Chorus]
Doom boy
We could hold hands
Listen to Slayer
In the back of my Dodge Caravan

[Breakdown]
Yeah!

[Outro]
Let me be your doom boy, baby
